string.base: This setup package is for 32-bit version of Windows. Please install the 64-bit version of this software.
string.translation: 这是32位元的视窗，请安装64位元的软件

string.base: [ProductName] requires that your computer is running Windows 2000, Windows XP or Windows 2003 Server.
string.translation: [ProductName] 需求视窗 2000, 视窗 XP or 视窗 2003 Server

string.base: You do not have sufficient privileges to complete this installation. Log on as an administrator and then retry this installation.
string.translation: 您没有权限进行安装，请用管理员帐号登入，然后重新进行安装。

string.base: (64-bit Windows)
string.translation: (64位元的视窗)

string.base: [NdasSetupVersion]
It is recommended that this product is used in 100Mbps wired LAN or 802.11g/a wireless LAN environment.
string.translation: 建议这个产品使用在 100Mbps 架线的网络 或 802.11g/a 无线网络环境。

string.base: If you are using this product in a wired 10Mbps LAN or wireless 802.11b LAN environment, there is a possiblity of data transmit error or unstable connection.
string.translation: 如果这产品使用在 10Mbps 架线的网络 或 802.11b 无线网络环境， 可能会出现数据传送错误或不稳定的连接。

string.base: Notice
string.translation: 通知

string.base: I &acknowledge this warning message.
string.translation: 我 &承认这个警告通知。

string.base: Setup detected a software.
string.translation: 按装程序发现了软件。

string.base: {&MSSansBold8}Compatibility Warning
string.translation: {&MSSansBold8}兼容性警告

string.base: {&Arial8BoldBlue}Setup has found that StarForce Copy Protection software is installed in your system. Some old versions of this software may cause a system crash for using thirdy party storage device drivers.
string.translation: {&Arial8BoldBlue}按装程序发现 StarForce 拷贝保护软件被安装在您的系统。一些这软件的老版本可能导致系统事故，尤其是使用第三者党存贮设备的驱动程序。

string.base: It is highly recommended to update the StarForce Copy Protection software before proceeding the installation. Check the web site of the Protection Technology (http://www.star-force.com) for the updates.
string.translation: 高度推荐在进行之前，更新StarForce 拷贝保护软件。请到技术网站(http://www.star-force.com)查看更新。

string.base: Setup has found a previous version of the software.
string.translation: 按装程序发现了早先版本。

string.base: {&MSSansBold8}Upgrade Confirmation
string.translation: {&MSSansBold8}升级确认

string.base: Setup has found a previous version of the software and will perform an upgrade. During an upgrade, you may have to reboot the system twice.
string.translation: 按装程序发现了早先版本, 将执行升级。在升级期间, 您可能必须重新起动系统两次。

string.base: To ensure proper operation, please do not interrupt the system reboot and follow the instructions until the setup is completed.
string.translation: 为保证适当的操作, 请不要中断系统重新起动，请遵守指示直到设定被完成。

string.base: Click Next to continue installation.
string.translation: 点击下一步继续安装

string.base: Newer version of the software is already installed. If you have to downgrade the software, uninstall the higher version software first.
string.translation: 软件的新版本已经被安装。如果您必须降低软件, 首先卸载更高的版本软件。

string.base: This setup requires Internet Information Server 4.0 or higher for configuring IIS Virtual Roots. Please make sure that you have IIS 4.0 or higher.
string.translation: 这个设定要求互联网信息服务器4.0 或更高以配置IIS虚拟根目录。请确认, 您有IIS 4.0 或更高。

string.base: This setup requires Administrator privileges for configuring IIS Virtual Roots.
string.translation: 这个设定要求管理员特权来配置IIS 虚拟根目录。
